name: Futurepunk 2069
description:
WELCOME IN MIDNIGHT CITY, PUNK!

„FUTUREPUNK 2069” IS IN ITS CORE DESIGN AN RPG WITH CHOICES AND CONSEQUENCES, COOL PLACES TO VISIT AND GUNS.. YES YOU READ THAT LINE RIGHT, GUNS! 

YOU TAKE ON THE ROLE OF THE MERCENARY Z, WHO IS ON A LIFE THREATENING MISSION TO OBTAIN INFORMATION ABOUT „CODENAME: PROJECT FRACTURE” FROM THE ARAKAS CORPORATION. HAUNTED BY THE GHOST OF JOHNNY SILVERARM, AN FORMER ROCKER ANARCHIST, WHO WANTS TO TAKE OVER THE CONTROL OF YOUR BODY. YOU FIND YOURSELF SEARCHING FOR HEMLECK, WHO WAS LAST SEEN IN THIS DISTRICT. HOPING THAT HE KNOWS THE ANSWERS TO YOUR QUESTIONS. 

WE HOPE YOU LIKE THIS SNEAK PEEK „VERTICAL-SLICE” OF OUR GAME AND WOULD LOVE TO HEAR YOUR FEEDBACK ON ITCH.IO! KEEP ON ROCKIN.

AVAILABLE LANGUAGES: ENGLISH, GERMAN (EARLY ACCESS)

PLAYTIME: 10 - 60 MINUTES
____________________________________________________

CONTROLS - (KEYBOARD/ CONTROLLER)

DRAW/ HOLSTER YOUR WEAPON: ALT /  LT
WEAPON TRIGGER: SPACE / RT
WEAPON RELOAD: R/ X
OPEN INVENTORY: I / SELECT
OPTIONS MENU: ESC / START
MIN DOC (HEALTH BOOSTER): X / LB
KARAZNIKOV (SPEED BOOSTER): V / R

WALKING: WASD OR ARROW KEYS / LEFT STICK.

____________________________________________________

THIS GAME WAS MADE IN 14 DAYS FOR THE 6TH ANNUAL GAME JAM HOSTED BY DRIFTWOOD GAMING! HAVE FUN, WHILE YOU BREAK EVERY SYSTEM WE CREATED WITH STYLE FOR YOU!

THANKS TO CD PROJEKT RED FOR THE OPPORTUNITY TO CREATE SUCH A PARODY. WE STILL LOVE YOU GUYS.  

ALL RIGHTS TO THEIR RESPECTIVE OWNERS.
